gbuild

Class GImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • gbuild.GComponent
      • gbuild.GImage

  • public class GImage
extends GComponent

    Component type for images

    Processing language environment manages images using PImage data type, which can be customized using other utilities. This class was designed to be the equivalent implementation of a PImage, but incorporating easy customization

    For more information about PImage, click here

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a new instance of an image

      • setImage

        public void setImage(java.lang.String path)
        Specify a new image located at a different path

        It is important to notice that image would not be loaded if it is null, but other excepctions are not managed. In future revisions we will fix this

        Parameters:
        path - local or external path

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Description copied from class: GComponent
        Draw component on the screen

        This method would draw the component taking into account all the customization done before.

        It is important to notice that component would not be drawn if visible state is not true.

        Specified by:
        draw in class GComponent
        See Also:
        GComponent.isVisible()
